Manu wrote:

> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Mike Clark [mailto:mike@...]
> >
> > Very well.  I agree that debug statements in limited form
> > serve a useful purpose.  For
> > example, perhaps a user would prefer to enable a category of
> > debug statements to output
> > the utilization of a pool of objects, for example.  However,
> > if these debug statements
> > are used to assert conditions, then I'd remove the statements
> > in favor of an assertion
> > facility (e.g. automated tests).  It's just my style...
>
> And this is exactly what I meant in my previous post.
>

OK.  It sounds like we have similar styles then.   Sorry to belabor the
point.

;-)

Mike
